properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued February 6 at 2:47PM PST until February 9 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, north winds 15 to 25 kt and
seas 7 to 9 feet. For the Gale Watch, north winds 25 to 35 kt
with gusts up to 40 kt and seas 13 to 18 feet possible.

* WHERE...Cape Mendocino to Pt Arena 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 AM PST Saturday.
For the Gale Watch, from Saturday morning through Sunday
morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SATURDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING
